item.title: How to run disposable databases for your tests. Improve your integration tests accuracy with Testcontainers
item.description: Integration tests are essential to ensure that the different components of our system work together as expected and continue to work after changes. In this post, I’ll explain how to spin up disposable database containers to use in integration tests.
